name: Vim: Vi IMproved
body:
### Vim resources

Built-in command line tutorial: `vimtutor`

[Vim Cheatsheet](http://www.viemu.com/vi-vim-cheat-sheet.gif)

[Vundle: vim package manager](https://github.com/VundleVim/Vundle.vim)

[Color Schemes](https://www.google.com/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#q=vim%20color%20schemes)

### A few basic things
`<Esc>` is your friend (puts you back in Normal mode)

`.` is magic (repeats last edit)

`i` enter Insert mode

`<Cr>` is vim talk for the Enter/Return key

`<C-r>` is vim talk for Ctrl + R (Redo)


Save current file: `:w<Cr>`

Save to a filename (Save As...): `:w filename<Cr>`

Exit (all changes are saved): ```:q<Cr>```

Exit without saving (ignore changes): `:q!<Cr>`

Save and Exit: `:wq<Cr>` or `ZZ` (note both Zs are upper case)


`~/.vimrc` is the default location of your configuration file (~ is current user's home folder)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
